ISSUE.TITLE: Need to get Geocoding working
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Ultimately this is where the core of the project depends on. When data is entered it needs to be geocoded and the lat long stored in the db along with the rest of the entry. This way all the entries can be displayed on a map as well as searched via location closest to an inputted address / the user eventually on mobile.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #261 from dunn/doc minor readme updates
